src:
Dua Warga Bekasi Tewas Usai Gelar Pesta Minuman Keras Oplosan
02 Nov 2019, 00:25 by , https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Ilustrasi miras. (CNN Indonesia/Hesti Rika)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- Dua orang warga Bekasi meninggal dunia usai pestaÂ miras oplosan di Bekasi. Kedua warga tersebut, yakni Iswanto (38) dan Ahmad Bubun (46).Sedangkan satu korban lainnya yang bernama Cecep Supriandi dirawat di rumah sakit karena ikut menenggak minuman yang sama.Pesta miras oplosan terjadi pada Senin (28/10). Diketahui, saat itu korban membeli miras dan meminumnya bersama secara berkelompok di rumah Bubun di Jalan Kampung Karang Jaya RT 001, Tambun Utara, Kabupaten Bekasi."Korban Iswanto bersama korban Cecep membeli minuman jenis ginseng oplosan dan minum di rumah Bubun sampai jam 00.30 WIB. Setelah itu mereka bubar," kata Kabid Humas Polda Metro Jaya Kombes Argo Yuwono saat dikonfirmasi, Jumat (1/11).Usai meminum miras, Argo mengatakan para korban kembali ke rumahnya masing-masing. Mereka pun sempat mendapat perawatan di rumah sakit.Diketahui, Korban Iswanto lebih dulu meninggal dunia dan setelahnya disusul korban Bubun yang dinyatakan tewas saat dirawat di rumah sakit."Tanggal 29 Oktober, jam 23.00 WIB korban Iswanto dibawa ke RSUD Bekasi. Namun, hari Rabu tanggal 30 Oktober 2019 Jam 17.00 WIB korban dinyatakan meninggal dunia," kata Argo."Selanjutnya pada tanggal 31 Oktober 2019 sekitar Jam 20.00 WIB korban Bubun meninggal," sambungnya.Argo belum merinci penyebab pasti kematian 2 warga Bekasi setelah menenggak miras oplosan itu. Argo hanya menyebut kasus itu sedang ditangani oleh Polsek Bekasi Timur.(mjo/agt)
text:
Two Bekasi Residents Killed After Hold Oplosan Liquor Party
02 Nov 2019, 00:25 by, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Illustration of alcohol. (CNN Indonesia / Hesti Rika)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia - Two Bekasi residents died after an adulterated alcoholic party in Bekasi. The two residents, namely Iswanto (38) and Ahmad Bubun (46). While one other victim named Cecep Supriandi was hospitalized for participating in drinking the same drink. The mixed alcohol party took place on Monday (28/10). It is known, at that time the victim bought alcohol and drank it together in a group at Bubun's house on Jalan Kampung Karang Jaya RT 001, North Tambun, Bekasi District. After that they broke up, "said Head of Jakarta Police Public Relations Commissioner Commissioner Argo Yuwono when confirmed, Friday (1/11). After drinking alcohol, Argo said the victims returned to their homes. They also had received treatment at the hospital. It is known, Iswanto Victim died first and then followed by Bubun victim who was declared dead while being treated at the hospital. "On October 29, at 23.00 WIB Iswanto victim was taken to Bekasi Regional Hospital. However, on Wednesday on 30 October 2019 at 17.00 WIB the victim was declared dead, "Argo said." Furthermore, on 31 October 2019 around 20.00 WIB the Bubun victim died, "he continued. Argo did not specify the exact cause of death of 2 Bekasi residents after downing the mixed alcohol. Argo only said that the case was being handled by the East Bekasi Police Station. (Mjo / agt)
